game.name: Let's play Persona 5 Royal!
game.creator: Atlus
game.steamDescription: Don the mask and join the Phantom Thieves of Hearts as they stage grand heists, infiltrate the minds of the corrupt, and make them change their ways!
game.whatIDid: I spent three days (in-game) doing my daily activities and also had a free-time event with Ryuji. Then, I visited Kamoshida's palace, battled random enemies, and spent some time doing puzzles.
game.myComments: Maloney:  I had so much fun playing this game! I'm still getting used to the gameplay, so I sometimes had to look at a guide to help me. The game's graphics and soundtrack are amazing! I'm looking forward to meet Yusuke as he is my favorite character of the game!

game.name: Let's play Undertale!
game.creator: Toby Fox
game.steamDescription: Welcome to UNDERTALE. In this RPG, you control a human who falls underground into the world of monsters. Now you must find your way out... or stay trapped forever.
game.whatIDid: I finished exploring the Waterfall area, fought Undyne and then became her friend. Then I spent some time grinding some gold at the Temmie's village.
game.myComments: Maloney:  I died multiple times fighting Undyne, but strangely enough, it was less hard than the previous boss fight. That friendship event was hilarious, gosh no wonder Papyrus sucks at cooking!

game.name: Let's play Danganronpa V3!
game.creator: Spike Chunsoft
game.steamDescription: A new cast of 16 characters find themselves kidnapped and imprisoned in a school. Inside, some will kill, some will die, and some will be punished.
game.whatIDid: Since I already finished the main game, I spent some time on the bonus modes, specifically the Talent Plan and Monokuma's test.
game.myComments: Maloney:  Gosh, playing DRV3's Talent Plan is a pain in the ass because luck plays a huge part in it. I had to restart a few times before developping a decent new S-Card.

game.name: Let's play Our Life!
game.creator: GB Patch
game.steamDescription: A twenty-dollar bill, four summers, fifteen years, and a one of a kind life. Create an experience thatâ€™s all your own in this near-fully customizable visual novel where you grow from childhood to adulthood with the lonely boy next door.
game.whatIDid: I played a few scenes during the early-teenage time period. I also played the Derek episodes.
game.myComments: Maloney:  Can you believe that is like, my eight replay of the game??? This time I am trying to play Derek's romance route. He's a really cute and wholesome guy although I definitely prefer Cove.
